response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $1,200,000. However, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price that reflects its immense value while ensuring a favorable transaction for both parties. Considering the market dynamics and the importance of this opportunity for us, I propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer includes all necessary support and customization services to ensure a seamless integration into your existing systems. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 950000}
